summary: In depth guide and extensive spreadsheet framework mainly intended on how to utilize two Game Settings (GMSTs) that has the most impact and effect on trading and bartering in-game.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-3-1365283267.png[/img]


[size=3]This is an extensive guide and in-depth analysis mainly made and referenced upon two [B]GMSTs[/B] (Game Settings) \"[B]fBarterBuyMin[/B]\" \"[B]fBarterSellMax[/B]\" and how they affect trading and bartering in-game. Well informed and commented  interactive spreadsheets that accurately determine the affects of the input modifiers.[/size]



[/center]

[center]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-4-1365283267.png[/img]

[size=4][b]Spreadsheet Layouts: Vanilla Reference Guide[/b][/size]

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/38116-1-1373354257.png[/img]

[size=4][b]Spreadsheet Layouts: Various Mods Reference Guide[/b][/size]

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/38116-2-1373354259.png[/img]


[/center]

[center]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-1-1367607153.png[/img]

[size=4][b]Permissions & Asset Usage:[/b][/size]
You may use this freely in your own works/projects/mods. 
Crediting me isn\'t required but would be appreciated. 

[/center]

[center]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-1-1365292602.png[/img]

[size=3][b][url=www.uesp.net]The Unoffical Elder Scrolls Pages (UESP)[/url][/b][/size]

[size=3][b]Bethesda Game Studios[/b][/size]
[/center]

[center]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-1-1365285493.png[/img]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5099468/][img]http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-1-1365291141.png[/img][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34444][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-2-1368511241.png[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35477][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-1-1368511239.png[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35804][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-1-1368658336.png[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36025][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-1-1368655631.png[/img][/url]
[/center]
author: jeclxohko
